alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; St. Francois; Washington (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 16 at 3:27PM CDT until July 16 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN JEFFERSON...NORTHEASTERN WASHINGTON AND NORTHWESTERN ST. FRANCOIS COUNTIES... At 327 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Old Mines, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Bonne Terre, De Soto, Potosi, Olympian Village, Mineral Point, Old Mines, Blackwell, Victoria, Cadet, Fletcher, Valles Mill, and French Village. This also includes Washington State Park and St. Francois State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
